蝚字的基本解释

蝚
róu
蝼蛄之类的害虫。
水蛭。

蝚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［róu］
［《廣韻》耳由切，平尤，日。］
(1)见“蛭蝚”。
(2)见“蝚蠕”。
[②]［náo］
［《集韻》奴刀切，平，娘。］
猿猴之属。

蝚字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝚； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1089第18
【唐韻】如由切【集韻】而由切，?音柔。蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】蝚，蛖螻。【註】蛖螻，螻蛄類。【又】蛭蝚至掌。【註】未詳。　又蝚蠕，國名。【晉書·馮跋載記】蝚蠕勇斛律遣使求跋女，跋許之。　又【集韻】奴刀切，音峱。與獶、猱同。貪獸也。【前漢·司馬相如傳】蛭蜩玃蝚。【師古註】今所爲戎皮，爲案褥者也。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋蟲】蝚，蠬螻。【註】蠬螻，螻蛄類。〕　謹照原文兩蠬字?改蛖。
蝚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝚字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm
róu
Pests such as mole crickets.
leech.
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［róu］
["Guangyun" Ear Youqie, Ping You, Day. ]
(1) See "Leechworm".
(2) See "worms".
[②]［náo］
["Jiyun" slave knife cut, flat , mother. ]
The genus of apes.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝚; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1089 Page 18
【Tang Yun】As you cut 【Ji Yun】and you cut, the sound is soft. Insect name. 【Erya·Release insects】worms, worms. [Note] worms, mole crickets. 【Also】Leech go to palm. 【Note】Unknown.　Again, the name of the country. 【Book of Jin·Feng Ba Zai Ji】Dendrobium courageously dispatched envoys to seek embarking women, and embarking on Xu Zhi.　[Jiyun] Slave knife cut, sound 峱. Same as 猱 and 猱. Greedy beasts too. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Leech 莃蝚. [Shigu Note] This is Rongpi, and it is also the case. Textual research: [[Erya·Release insects] worms, worms. [Note] Mole crickets, mole crickets. 〕 　 Would you like to change the two words according to the original text?
